name: Tanya
greetingText: In a world full of ordinary moments, you are my favorite exception. ✨
wishText: You are not just special—you are the kind of rare that makes life more beautiful. May your heart always be as light as your laughter, your dreams as limitless as the sky, and your happiness as endless as the love you bring into the world. You deserve nothing but the best, always. ❤️
